title.en: To Manage - Achieving Actions (Conseguir hacer algo)
title.es: To Manage - Achieving Actions (Conseguir hacer algo)

description.en: Learn to use 'to manage to do something' for achieving actions with effort or difficulty. Use 'to manage' when you succeed in doing something, not for obtaining objects.
description.es: Aprende a usar 'to manage to do something' para lograr acciones con esfuerzo o dificultad. Usa 'to manage' cuando logras hacer algo, no para obtener objetos.

prompt.es: Ella consigue ver a sus padres una vez cada quincena.

exercises.solution: She manages to see her parents once a fortnight.

tip.en: Use 'to manage to do something' for achieving actions with effort.
tip.es: Usa 'to manage to do something' para lograr acciones con esfuerzo.

prompt.es: Logré terminar el informe a tiempo para la reunión.

exercises.solution: I managed to finish the report in time for the meeting.

tip.en: Use 'managed to' for past achievements that required effort.
tip.es: Usa 'managed to' para logros pasados que requirieron esfuerzo.

prompt.es: Conseguimos hablar con la persona responsable del proyecto.

exercises.solution: We managed to talk to the person in charge of the project.

tip.en: Use 'to manage to do something' for achieving actions with effort.
tip.es: Usa 'to manage to do something' para lograr acciones con esfuerzo.
